Dimarso * Brussels, Belgium Marketing Unit * Belgium Gallup marked analyse * Copenhagen, Denmark GFK Danmark * Denmark Emnid Institut * Bielefeld, Germany Sample Institut * Germany ICAP sa * Athens, Greece KEME * Athens, Greece Gallup sa * Madrid, Spain CIMEI * Madrid, Spain Institut de Sondages lavialle * France TMO Consultants * France Irish Marketing Surveys ltd * Dublin, Ireland Lansdowne Market Research * Ireland Doxa * Milan, Italy Pragma * Italy ILRES * Luxembourg NIPO * Amsterdam, the Netherlands NORMA * Lisbon, Portugal Social Surveys ( Gallup Poll ) ltd. * London, Great Britain NOP Corporate and Financial * London, Great Britain Ulster Marketing Services * Northern Ireland (data collector)

ddi:stdyInfo.ddi:abstract: Regular monitoring of social and political attitudes of residents of the member nations of the European Community are cumulated in one file. Satisfaction with democracy / overall life satisfaction / desired social change / first and second most important national political goal / European unification / support of the common market / life expectations / danger of war, nuclear energy, income inequality, terrorism, government management, military defence, environmental pollution / materialist/post-materialist values index / cognitive mobilization index. Background variables: basic characteristics/ residence/ housing situation/ household characteristics/ occupation/employment/ education/ social class/ politics/ religion/ organizational membership
